mechanics.condition: Target is a creature OR an object OR a creation of magical force
Targeted creature fails Dexterity Saving Throw
Creature's hit points are reduced to 0 by this spell's damage
mechanics.outcome: Creature and all non-magic items it wears/carries are disintegrated into fine gray dust

mechanics.trigger: Attempt to restore a disintegrated creature to life
mechanics.condition: Creature was disintegrated by Disintegrate spell
mechanics.outcome: Only True Resurrection OR Wish spell can restore the creature to life

mechanics.trigger: Object or Creation of Magical Force Targeted
mechanics.condition: Target is a nonmagical object OR creation of magical force AND Target is Large size or smaller

mechanics.trigger: Object or Creation of Magical Force Targeted
mechanics.condition: Target is a Huge or larger nonmagical object OR creation of magical force
mechanics.outcome: A 10-foot-cube portion of the target is disintegrated

description_text: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger to a target that you can see within range. The target can be a creature, an object, or a creation of magical force, such as the wall created by wall of force.A creature targeted by this spell must make a dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 10d6 + 40 force damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is disintegrated.A disintegrated creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a true resurrection or a wish spell.This spell automatically disintegrates a Large or smaller nonmagical object or a creation of magical force. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of force, this spell disintegrates a 10-foot-cube portion of it. A magic item is unaffected by this spell.
